channel.title: About the RPG Chat category
channel.description:
Chat about actual play of, prepping to play, and running of LARPs and RPGs. See Gauntlet Publishing for Gauntlet releases.
*Please do not use RPG Chat (nor any other category) to look for players for your game.*
